donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
Bio-BSS study aims to provide a solid base for on-going surveillance of high-risk behaviour as an integral part of the Albania National AIDS Program Monitoring and Evaluation Plan, and improve estimates of the scale of and trends in high-risk behavior among vulnerable groups. 
Enhancement of social services activity aims to support the development and dissemination of protocols for services and the referral system within social and health institutions based on the law on HIV and AIDS and also on the orders of ministers of MOH and MOLSA.  The protocols will be disseminated in parallel among the net of NGOs working on HIV as part of the referral system. 
PAF-UNAIDS supports comprehensive services and commodity access for vulnerable populations understanding the uptake of services from population and risk.
Empowerment of young people to protect themselves from HIV/AIDS.

project_descr: One UN Support on access to services-HIV
project_title: One UN Support on access to services - HIV
